channel.title: Samantha Punch on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Samantha Punch on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Food for Thought. The food and care study
item.description: SP - Samantha Punch Professor Samantha Punch of the University of Stirling summarised the original research project, the use of food and food practices in residential child care in Scotland. This project gave rise to the Food for Thought project. She describes the research questions, the findings and how they set about putting the findings into practice. SP ... on a very broad thing, we weren't interested in nutrition and healthy eating or eating disorders and whilst these things are important and they may have emerged as important, that wasn't our key focus.
